definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 该超级营养素在天然果蔬的色彩缤纷的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: Near the top of the nutrient-dense food list are whole eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在营养素密集食品排行榜上鸡蛋名列前茅。

sentences.english: Timed-release caplets provide a gradual release of vital nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 定时释放粒提供了一个逐步释放的重要营养素。

sentences.english: Micronutrient deficiencies are also common in this region.
sentences.chinese: 微量营养素缺乏在这一地区也很普遍。

sentences.english: Calcium and other nutrients intakes we re assessed by a food-frequency method.
sentences.chinese: 钙和其它营养素摄入量用食物频率法评价。

sentences.english: The simple sugars from fruits are important nutrients and vitamins for our body.
sentences.chinese: 水果中的单糖是身体中需要的重要营养素和维生素。

sentences.english: Funds can buy micro-nutrients customized to locations.
sentences.chinese: 基金可以购买根据当地情况特制的微营养素。

sentences.english: Very few foods are natural sources of this nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 很少有食物是这种营养素的天然来源。

sentences.english: The energy content of a diet depends upon its macronutrient composition.
sentences.chinese: 膳食的能量含量取决于其常量营养素组成。

sentences.english: How can food and nutrients reverse the aging process?
sentences.chinese: 食物和营养素如何反转衰老进程？

sentences.english: Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles.
sentences.chinese: 未确认为养分状况必需的营养素由AAFCO犬粮。

sentences.english: Provide an overview of the major macro and micronutrients relevant to human health.
sentences.chinese: 简述影响人体健康主要的高量营养素与微量营养素。

sentences.english: Provide an overview of the major macro and micronutrients relevant to human health.
sentences.chinese: 简述影响人体健康主要的高量营养素与微量营养素。

sentences.english: It's high in fibre and nutrients that help burn blubber.
sentences.chinese: 其中含量较高的纤维素和各种营养素能帮你燃烧赘肉。

sentences.english: Fats or lipids are the second important nutrients next to carbohydrates.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪又叫脂质，它仅次于碳水化合物的第二大营养素。

sentences.english: The second type of nutrient is called a “micronutrient”.
sentences.chinese: 第二种类型是“微量营养素”。
